summary: Provides a high‑performance NVIDIA DALI dataset that reads audio files and their transcriptions from one or more manifest files, applies optional resampling, trimming, duration filtering, padding, and audio feature extraction (e.g., mel‑spectrogram or MFCC), and yields batched tensors on the chosen CPU or GPU device.
business_intent: Accelerate training and inference pipelines for speech‑recognition models by delivering fast, scalable, and configurable audio‑text loading and preprocessing using GPU‑based DALI pipelines.
